<style type='text/css'>
.pane-sliders .panel {border:0;} 
  div.panel h3.pane-toggler-down, div.panel h3.pane-toggler {padding:10px; color:#99CC00; border-top-left-radius:4px; border-top-right-radius:4px; -moz-border-top-left-radius:4px; -moz-border-top-right-radius:4px; -webkit-border-top-left-radius:4px; -webkit-border-top-right-radius:4px; background:#f6f6f6; border:1px solid #ccc;  border-top:2px solid #99CC00;} 
  div.pane-slider.pane-down {border:1px solid #ccc; border-top:0;}
  div.pane-slider ul.adminformlist li {border-bottom: 1px solid #EEEEEE; margin: 0; overflow: hidden; padding: 5px 5px;}
  div.pane-slider ul.adminformlist li > label { height:20px; line-height:24px; margin: 0 10px 0 0; text-align:right;padding:10px 0px;}
  div.pane-slider ul.adminformlist input, div.pane-slider ul.adminformlist select {padding:3px 5px; height:24px; line-height:24px; border-radius:2px; -moz-border-radius:2px; -webkit-border-radius:2px;}
